document_data.mainbody: '''Gulthmeran Reserve''' was a variety of [[wine]], produced on the southern [[Dragon Coast]] and the northern [[Vilhon Reach]]. It was exported as far as the [[Western Heartlands]], the lands along the [[River Chionthar]], and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: This high quality yet harsh-flavored wine was in high demand among those of discriminating taste palettes. It was sold in small {{SI|0.4|lb|k|long=yes}} round green [[glass]] [[cork]]ed bottles.
